detailsOfAchievement: Vision To provide integrated knowledge for character building to the people and develop intellect among them so our country may lead the world. Mission To lay down the foundation for inclusive, sustainable, moral and value based education for the people. Sanskriti Welfare Trust (SWT) one of the non-government organizations, works in the fields of education, research, publication, training and social welfare, is contributing significantly in enriching the history of tradition of the society and social welfare since its inception. It is becoming a reputed NGO to promote welfare of the society especially in rural areas by providing moral and value based education, training skills development and elevates literacy particularly for rural and urban children those are not enrolled in any school. SWT is sure that the diversity of articles and knowledge contained in their journals publication be accessible to all the research scholars who are planning and pursuing research and further exploration in the society especially in rural areas. Such initiatives taken up by SWT will certainly encourage researchers more and more to indulge in research activities and social welfare of the society. Recently, SWT has started publishing three Journals named, Indian Journal of Business Research and Analysis (IJBRA), Indian Journal of Integrated Research and Analysis (IJIRA) and Journal of Legal Views and Reviews (JLVR). They are refereed journal in their respective fields. Sanskriti Welfare Trust believes in character building to the people of the country and provides a platform for the people to develop intellect among them through setting knowledge based culture in the society. Sanskriti It is called culture in English. The meaning of the term is the integrated pattern of human knowledge, belief, values, attitude and behaviour that depend upon the capacity for learning and transmitting knowledge to succeeding generations. We have got the legacy of knowledge, kindness, devotion, determination, dedication, ethics, moral values, patriotism etc. from our great ancestors. It is our responsibility to transfer these glorious cultures and their qualities to our generations so that they may lead and teach the world.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Our vision is to provide integrated knowledge for character building to the people and develop intellect among them through setting up knowledge based culture in the society by which discrimination among people can be removed so that they can become equal in all areas of human life.
